content.text:
# Draft:Marion Warner

Marion Warner was an actress in American films. She had dozens of roles including as a mom.
Filmogeaphy
*The Blood Seedling (1915) a Selig Polyscope film adapted from a story by U.S. Secretary of State John Hay
*The Vengeance of Rahhah (1915)
*In Leopard Land
*In the Line of Duty (1915) as Helen Brant
*The Old Code (1915), a Selig film
*The Octopus (1915), a Selig film
*A Jungle Revenge (1915), a Selig film
*Unto Those Who Sin (1916)
*The Little Patriot (1917)
*The Curse of Eve (1917)
*Little Lost Sister (1917)
*Tears and Smiles (1917)
References
